Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
See how SymphonyAI Industrial and Microsoft Azure are transforming manufacturing and industrial operations with IRIS Foundry, a powerful Industrial DataOps and AI platform. Learn how organizations can unify and contextualize their data, leverage AI-powered knowledge graphs and the IRIS Copilot, and deploy Unified Namespace (UNS) and Unified Data Models
